title: Science-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project: Developing Applied Knowledge Through PBL (Project-Based Learning)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Collaborative environment enabling real-time teamwork and project development using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real scientific phenomena through mathematical modeling and propose problem-solving strategies

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
